title: MMA Junkie Radio #2993: Conor McGregor, Jon Jones, UFC on ESPN 6
text:
Thursday’s edition of MMA Junkie Radio with hosts “Gorgeous” George and “Goze” is here!

On Episode 2,993 of the podcast, the guys look ahead to Friday’s UFC on ESPN 6 card, discuss the latest with Conor McGregor and Jon Jones’ plea deal.

The rundown

Conor McGregor says he’s willing to fight Frankie Edgar for free – but is he?

Is McGregor’s fight talk just a smokescreen to keep people from talking about continued allegations in his personal life?

Jon Jones took a plea deal in a court proceeding after an allegation stemming from an incident at a strip club.

Speaking of Jones, he’s looking for his next opponent. Should the recently unretired Anthony Johnson be that guy?

UFC on ESPN 6 goes down Friday. Maycee Barber is on the card, but is calling out women’s strawweight champion Weili Zhang and flyweight champ Valentina Shevchenko.

And Jeremy Stephens gets his rematch with Yair Rodriguez after their 15-second no contest a month ago. Did he cross the line with comments he made this week?

Stream or download this and all episodes of MMA Junkie Radio over at AudioBoom, or check it out above. You can also catch it on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, and more. A new episode of the podcast is released every Monday and Thursday.
description: Hosts "Gorgeous" George and "Goze" break down the latest MMA news, including Conor McGregor, Jon Jones and the talk out of UFC on ESPN 6.
